genresAdvancedInfo.name: hard glam
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Hard glam is a subgenre of glam rock that emerged in the late 1970s and early 1980s. It features a heavier sound with distorted guitars, pounding drums, and aggressive vocals. Hard glam bands often incorporate elements of punk and metal into their music, creating a high-energy and rebellious sound.
